data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio Azteca.
Throw-in for Leon at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 2, Cruz Azul are pushing forward but Elias Hernandez's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Cruz Azul drive upfield and Elias Hernandez gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Leon defender.
In the minute 4, Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Luis Romo (Cruz Azul) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Juan Escobar scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 7, Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leon's Joel Campbell gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Azteca. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in the half of Leon.
In the minute 11, Important block from the Leon defence as Luis Romo fires in a strike for Cruz Azul.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 15, Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a throw-in for Cruz Azul, close to Leon's area.
Cruz Azul's Luis Romo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Leon defender.
In the minute 16, Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Can Leon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cruz Azul's half?
Ball safe as Cruz Azul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 21, Luis Romo (Cruz Azul) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Leon a goal kick.
Joel Campbell gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leon.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Leon in the half of Cruz Azul.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Leon have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to Leon.
Cruz Azul's Jonathan Rodriguez is on target but unsuccessful.
Leon to take a throw-in in Cruz Azul territory.
In the minute 31, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Leon.
Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Juan Escobar's header is off-target for Cruz Azul.
Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
In the minute 38, Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cruz Azul's half?
Leon drives forward and Emanuel Gigliotti gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in their own half.
In the minute 40, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Cruz Azul throw-in in Leon's half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Throw-in Leon.
In the minute 41, Leon needs to be cautious. Cruz Azul have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Leon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Leon in Mexico City.
In the minute 43, Free kick Leon.
Leon's Luis Montes gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Cruz Azul have a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Leon at Estadio Azteca.
Throw-in for Leon close to the penalty box.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, Cesar Arturo Ramos has blown to start the second-half.
Pedro Aquino is replacing Gil Buron for the away team.
Ignacio Rivero is on a sub for Roberto Alvarado for Cruz Azul.
In the minute 48, Leon have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 51, Leon have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in the half of Leon.
Leon to take a throw-in in Cruz Azul territory.
In the minute 53, In Mexico City, Orbelin Pineda of Cruz Azul is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Cruz Azul throw-in in Leon's half.
In the minute 55, Throw-in Leon.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Azteca.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 58, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Yairo Moreno for Leon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Can Cruz Azul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leon's half?
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
Emanuel Gigliotti is booked for the away team.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Leon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The away team replace Joel Campbell with Osvaldo Rodriguez.
In the minute 65, Free kick Leon.
Leon's Luis Montes breaks free at Estadio Azteca. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
In the minute 67, Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cruz Azul's half?
In Mexico City Leon attack through Pedro Aquino. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
In the minute 69, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Leon.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Free kick for Leon in the half of Cruz Azul.
Goal kick for Cruz Azul at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Leon in the half of Cruz Azul.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Cruz Azul have a dangerous throw-in.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 77, Misael Dominguez is replacing Elias Hernandez for Cruz Azul at Estadio Azteca.
The away team have replaced Jose Rodriguez with Jesse Zamudio. This is the third substitution made today by Marcos Ignacio Ambriz.
In the minute 77, Juan Escobar (Cruz Azul) has received a first yellow card.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Leon.
Throw-in high up the field for Leon in Mexico City.
In the minute 79, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the away team a throw-in.
Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, Throw-in Leon.
Throw-in for Leon in their own half.
Leon have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In the minute 84, Leon surge into the attack at Estadio Azteca but David Ramirezâ€™s header is off-target.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Leon in the half of Cruz Azul.
Cruz Azul make their third substitution with Santiago Gimenez replacing Jonathan Rodriguez.
Ball safe as Cruz Azul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ignacio Rivero (Cruz Azul) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 87, At Estadio Azteca, Pedro Aquino has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Cruz Azul throw-in in Leon's half.
Cruz Azul to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
In the minute 89, An attacking Cruz Azul player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Throw-in for Leon at Estadio Azteca.
Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
Leon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Leon at Estadio Azteca.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Leon drive forward but Emanuel Gigliotti is judged offside.
The match has come to a close in Mexico City. The final score is 2-0.
It's now 2-0 to Cruz Azul as Santiago Gimenez scores from the spot.
